AT.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus
AT.description: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus verbindet ein Action-Abenteuer mit Rollenspiel-Elementen und aufwändigen Grafiken zu einer nostalgischen Welt, die anders ist als alles, was du jemals zuvor gesehen hast. Navigiere dich durch Horden ruchloser Monster und riesigen Boss-Kämpfen in retro-gepixelter Pracht! Löse Puzzles, sprich mit den Einwohnern, erhalte Fähigkeiten und bring die Hoffnung zurück ins einst so friedliche Exidus.

movies.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus - Video

AU.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus
AU.description: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus fuses together action adventure and RPG elements with lavish visuals to create a nostalgic world unlike anything you’ve seen before. Navigate your way through hordes of nefarious monsters and massive boss battles in retro pixelated 2D glory! Solve puzzles, converse with locals and gain skills to restore hope to the once peaceful Exidus.

movies.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus - Video

BG.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus
BG.description: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus fuses together action adventure and RPG elements with lavish visuals to create a nostalgic world unlike anything you’ve seen before. movies.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus - Video

BE.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus
BE.description: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus mêle action, aventure et certains éléments propres aux RPG, le tout avec des graphismes somptueux, créant ainsi une atmosphère nostalgique jamais vue. Frayez votre chemin au-delà des hordes de monstres abominables et des boss imposants dans ce jeu au style rétro pixellisé en 2D ! Résolvez des énigmes, parlez aux autochtones et gagnez de l'expérience et vous arriverez peut-être à rétablir l'espoir qui régnait jadis dans Exidus.

movies.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus - vidéo

ES.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus
ES.description: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus fusiona elementos de acción/aventura y RPG con unos espléndidos entornos visuales para crear un mundo nostálgico distinto a todo lo que has visto jamás. ¡Ábrete camino a través de una plaga de perversos monstruos participando en impresionantes batallas contra jefes en un glorioso entorno pixelado en 2D! Resuelve rompecabezas, habla con los lugareños y mejora tus habilidades para devolver la esperanza a Exidus, un lugar donde antes reinó la paz.

movies.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus - Vídeo

IT.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus
IT.description: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus coniuga elementi di azione-avventura e GdR con una splendida grafica per creare un mondo nostalgico come non ne hai mai visti prima d'ora. Fatti strada tra orde di malefici mostri ed epiche battaglie boss in tutta la gloria pixellata dello stile 2D rétro! Risolvi enigmi, parla con gli abitanti e guadagna abilità per riportare la speranza e la pace nelle terre di Exidus.

NL.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus
NL.description: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus brengt actie, avontuur en RPG-elementen samen met levendige visuals voor een nostalgische wereld die niet vergelijkbaar is met wat dan ook. Vind je weg door hordes snode monsters en enorme gevechten met bazen in retro 2D glorie in pixelstijl! Los puzzels op, praat met bewoners en breid je vaardigheden uit om het ooit vredige Exidus weer hoop te geven.

movies.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus - Video

movies.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus - Video

PT.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus
PT.description: O jogo Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus combina elementos de uma aventura de ação e RPG com gráficos sumptuosos para criar um mundo nostálgico único. Abre caminho através de hordas de monstros desprezíveis e enfrenta chefões em enormes batalhas, em toda a glória retro 2D pixelizada! Resolve quebra-cabeças, conversa com locais e adquire capacidades para trazeres de volta a esperança ao outrora pacífico mundo de Exidus.

movies.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus - Vídeo

RU.name: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus
RU.description: Chronicles of Teddy: Harmony of Exidus сочетает в себе приключенческий экшен и элементы RPG с красочной графикой, создавая ностальгический мир, не похожий ни на что виденное вами ранее. Прокладывайте себе путь через орды нечестивых монстров и схватки с боссами в ретро-пиксельном 2D -мире! Решайте головоломки, беседуйте со встречными персонажами и обретайте умения, чтобы вернуть надежду некогда мирному Exidus.
